skins.json_comment: Don't reorder the objects on this list, it can cause issues online,
instead use the 'group' to sort characters that belong together
Similarly, do not add new characters above previously available characters.
For now, add new characters at the bottom of the file, just above custom (unless you actually added a custom char!)
description: It's you! Just you! Create and be exactly who you wanna be, but the name stays the same.
The mascot of Newgrounds! Ever more widely known as John Captain. We found his name on the toy box, look it up.
The amazing dog straight out of the 2020 Pet Jam and from TV!
The luckiest boy in all of Boston!
A not so nice crewmate from Among Us.

"I wasn’t born in the traditional sense but rather constructed. An impossible, technical
marriage of flesh and paradox. At least that's what my baby pictures say."
Between her and Margo, the people chose her. Welcome to Newgrounds ENA!

This cute alien has been escaping the clutches of the
government for a long time. Sound familiar?

This isn’t Hank, this isn’t Deimos or anyone canonically cool or special.
This is the guy who dies, repeatedly.

But I guess there's no reasoning with madness. Or cats for that matter!
Seriously, try talking sense into a cat. They just stare at you with their lifeless, patronizing eyeballs...
Last year this little fella saved Christmas <3

My personal favourite Smiling Friend :)
you found his piece of cheese in 2020!
He cried all the way from his mother's basement to be here!

Antagonist, creator of the Improbability Drive? Is that a Douglas Adams reference?
Lemme DM Krinkels real quick. Okay, he said: 'it absolutely is!' while streaming Furi.
The boyfriend from the number one rated rhythm game of all time on Newgrounds, Friday Night Funkin'
